english.segment1: I look to the hills, where does my help come from?. From You, You alone, you're reaching out for me. You are my Savior
english.segment2: You are the Lord Almighty, none can stand against Your name. Lord, Your name has the power to save, power to save. You are the Lord Almighty, there is nothing like Your love. Lord, Your love, You have given it all, given it all
english.segment3: I come to the cross, there I find all I need. Surrender my heart, Jesus, draw near to me. You are my Savior
english.segment4: You are the Lord Almighty, none can stand against Your name. Lord, Your name has the power to save, power to save. You are the Lord Almighty, there is nothing like Your love. Lord, Your love, You have given it all, given it all
english.segment5: You are the one I live for, You are the one that saves. You are the light that shines in us. You are the one I live for, You are the one that saves. You are the light that shines
english.segment6: You are the Lord Almighty, none can stand against Your name. Lord, Your name has the power to save, power to save. You are the Lord Almighty, there is nothing like Your love. Lord, Your love, You have given it all, given it all
english.segment7: You are the Lord Almighty, none can stand against Your name. Lord, Your name has the power to save, power to save. You are the Lord Almighty, there is nothing like Your love. Lord, Your love, You have given it all, given it all
